name: tonybanters/zdump
description: A Quick and Painless Dump Extension for PHP

suggest.ext-zdump: Loaded after build; 'php -m' should list zdump.

post-install-cmd: sh -c 'dst=$(php-config --extension-dir); test -w "$dst" && install -m 0755 modules/zdump.so "$dst" || { echo "[zdump] Extension dir not writable; run: sudo install -m 0755 modules/zdump.so $(php-config --extension-dir)"; }'
